import './About.css'; import chang from '../../images/people/people-chang.jpg'; import kritika from '../../images/people/people-kritika.jpg'; import nuha from '../../images/people/people-nuha.jpg'; import leafDesktop from '../../images/backgrounds/leaf-about-desktop.jpg'; import leafMobile from '../../images/backgrounds/leaf-about-mobile.jpg'; import timelineDesktop from '../../images/backgrounds/timeline-desktop.svg'; import timelineMobile from '../../images/backgrounds/timeline-mobile.svg'; import beige from '../../images/blobs/blob-xl-beige-about.svg'; import rust from '../../images/blobs/blob-rust.svg'; import sustainabilityDesktop from '../../images/cycles/cycle-sustainability-desktop.svg'; import sustainabilityMobile from '../../images/cycles/cycle-sustainability-mobile.svg'; import Header from '../Shared/Header/Header'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; const BeliefsBodyDesktop = () => ( <>

We believe in

Earth

We believe in the power of plants

We care about our impact on our planet

We support those who protect it

Community

We started by listening and are dedicated to growing

We collaborate to deliver

We believe we all have a part in this transformation

Innovation

We are visionaries of change that exceed today’s standards

We are environmentalists harnessing science

We are devoted to plant chemistry, biology and engineering

); const BeliefsBodyMobile = () => ( <>

); const promise = getMetrics(); function About() { const [metrics, setMetrics] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { promise.then(metrics => { setMetrics(metrics); }); }, []); return ( <> erthos™ - About us
{/* 1. We believe in */}
{/* 2. Meet our founders */}

Meet our founders
{/* How it started */}

How it started
{/* Sustainability is our mission */}

Sustainability is our mission

Protecting our planet, while aligning with key UN Sustainable Development Goals.

{metrics.co2EmissionsReduced} KG

{metrics.waterSaved ? metrics.waterSaved.toLocaleString() : ''} L

{metrics.energySaved ? metrics.energySaved.toLocaleString() : ''} KG

{metrics.plasticDiverted} KG

Do you believe in the power of plants too?

View open positions Contact Us
); } export default About;
